entities.description: Various methods by which respondents acquired alcoholic beverages.
Frequency at which the respondents used methods to obtain alcohol.
Indicates if the respondent used alcohol in the past 30 days.
Indicates if the respondent used drugs while drinking alcohol.
Indicates if the respondent used marijuana or cannabis.

relationships.description: Specifies the method the respondent used to acquire alcohol.
Relates the method of acquiring alcohol to the frequency of its usage.
Indicates whether the respondent consumed alcohol in the past 30 days.
Denotes if the respondent used drugs while consuming alcohol.
Indicates whether the respondent used marijuana or cannabis.

triplet.subject: Respondent
triplet.object: My parent or guardian gave it to me

triplet.subject: Respondent
triplet.object: I got it from a friend/acquaintance
